Helen Gibson

  1. Foster Name: Helen Evangeline Kurth
  2. Foster Family: Jacob and Anna Kurth
  3. Location of Family: Albion, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Albion, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 11/28/1910, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1/8/2006, NM
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Helen Evangeline Monroe
  11. Spouse Name: Dottis Donald Monroe
  12. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Albion Weekly News (NE), 19 December 1912, and 11 November 1943, 10:4-5; Gravestone, Clayton Cemetery, Clayton, NM; "Monroe," Albuquerque Journal (NM), January 12, 2006, accessed September 21, 2020, https://infoweb.newsbank.com/resources/doc/nb/obit/1125F6AED5089520-1125F6AED5089520?p=OBIT.
